backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing blog posts with create, fetch, list, search, and slug retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing an update to the hero section text and styling in HeroSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing layout, components, pages, hooks, config, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables using OKLCH color values with light/dark mode tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and declaring sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing site URLs including home, blog, about, and five sample blog posts.
frontend/scripts/README-sitemap.md: Instructions for updating sitemap.xml when blog posts change.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for home, blog list, blog post, and about pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/blog/BlogPostCar: Card component displaying a blog post’s title, date, excerpt, and link to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/home/DailyTaskSe: Daily task UI with random task link generator and secret code submission with success message.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero section with welcome message from Md. Habibur Rahman and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksMe: Promotional card for TimeBucks with benefits, bonus highlight, and external signup link.
frontend/src/components/home/TimeBucksSt: Renders a styled step-by-step guide in Bangla explaining how to earn from TimeBucks, including steps, notes, and icons.
frontend/src/components/home/TranscribeM: Displays a detailed TranscribeMe job info card with steps, tips, and a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/home/WelcomeSect: Shows a welcome message introducing the site owner and upcoming earning resources.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileMen: Implements a mobile side menu with scroll locking, escape handling, navigation links, and help resources.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Provides a multi-column footer with site info, quick links, help links, social icons, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the header with logo, navigation, active state logic, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the site layout structure with background layers, header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/monetization/AdP: A placeholder component showing mock ad space in various sizes for layout planning.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Ads: Loads an Adsterra script once and renders a container for the native ad banner.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays a mock affiliate product card with placeholder title, description, and button.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: React component that sets page title, meta tags, and canonical link for SEO using site configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlogPosts.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, search, and fallback to sample blog posts when backend or identity is unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode themes, and responsive background styling.
frontend/src/lib/blogSampleFallback.ts: Contains sample blog post data used when the backend is empty or unreachable.
frontend/src/lib/helpLinks.ts: Exports a small list of admin help links with labels and URLs.
frontend/src/lib/siteConfig.ts: Defines global site configuration for name, description, URL, and default SEO image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, Internet Identity provider, React Query, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, biography content, expertise sections, and contact details.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Renders the blog list with SEO metadata, loading/error states, ad banner, and a grid of BlogPostCard components.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a single blog post with SEO metadata, date formatting, ads, affiliate section, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage using multiple content sections, featured task components, ads, and SEO setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind configuration including theme extensions, color variables, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, feature notes, styling requirements, issues, and architectural guidelines.
